about_the_game:
Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

This game contains content that is not appropriate for all ages or for viewing in the workplace.
and inappropriate for viewing in the workplace.
Characters, storyline and action are fictitious.
Nudity or sexual content, general adult content

This game contains the following content

non-consensual sex
Extreme play
Sex with violence
Extreme SM play
BDSM

All characters must be 18 years of age or older.

★caution★

All text in this game has been translated by machine translation.

■story■


Immediately after graduating from university, I arranged an arranged date according to the recommendation of my parents, and got married as I was told.
New wife "Mariko Shiozawa".
Every day of life without complaints but without stimulation.
I get teased about it by my college friends.
We impulsively shoplift at the local supermarket.
The scene is held down by the supermarket clerk "Tatsuya Shimazaki", threatened, and asked for a body.
Mariko refused at first, but unlike her husband's plain sex,Tatsuya's rape, which asks for a body, gradually indulges she.
Without being able to consult with my husband, I was taught pleasures that I did not know until now, and before I knew it
Seeking pleasure from Mariko, she began to visit the supermarket where Tatsuya was waiting.
end up
After devouring pleasure with desire...


Japanese voice recording （※Male characters are not recorded)


◆Game Specifications◆
Novel game that can be read by clicking.
Heroine full voice
CG mode
Scene recollection


◆Content warning◆
The game contains nudity or sexual content, violence, sexual assault, drug use, or non-consensual sex,BDSM.
general adult content.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains adult content intended for individuals over the age of 18.
This includes nudity, sex scenes,non-consensual sex,BDSM, overtly sexual images, and images with a sexual connotation.
Do not play this game if you are not yet 18 years of age or if you are visiting from a country or region where adult content is specifically prohibited by law.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.5+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA, AMD or Intel Graphics with support for DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA, AMD or Intel Graphics with support for DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound

short_description: Mariko finds out that she shoplifted and is humiliated, but she gradually indulges in pleasure...
